title: About These Mystery Mini Icons
body:
https://imgur.com/5grJEsc

Are those 8 icons the only ones you can get? I only wanna know if I can attempt to keep rolling my Blue Essence for a Tristana Icon, or maybe the icon doesn't even exist. This was never clarified.

Anyone got an answer?

replies.body: Mystery Icon Box and Mysteyr Minis will be seperate icons.  Here is the full list of icons you can get in each, via the [Emporyium FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088).
Dar de ce nu le-ati pus separat, gen ce iconite pica din mini icons box si din mistery icon..?

No Trist anywhere in there :(
But thank you for the response!
you can only get the icons in the pic
I got trolled by Riot...I wanted the Morg one...took 8 tries...I guess i can say i have the set now.
I got the morg one on my first try :)
if i bought my 9th mystery mini icon. what will i get? does it duplicate one of the icons from the 8?
Tbh i think this icon is the best. LOOK HOW CUTE IT IS. KAWAIIII
I got Fizz for now. He cute <3
